name: Publicly Accessible Disks for AWS/Alibaba
query: {   securityGroups(     where: {       vms_SOME: { publicIpAddress_NOT: null }       rules_SOME: {         direction: "Inbound"         action: "Allow"         AND: [           {             OR: [               { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" }               { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0" }             ]           }           {             OR: [               { sourceFromPort_LTE: 22, sourceToPort_GTE: 22 }               { sourceFromPort_LTE: 3389, sourceToPort_GTE: 3389 }             ]           }         ]       }     }   ) {     vms {       diskAttachments {         disk {           identifier           accountID           cloudAccountID           cloudAccountName           cloudProvider           idFromProvider           internalAssetType           internalName           internalRegion           assetCategory         }       }     }   } }
